title: Mixed fortunes for Commerzbank & Credit Agricole
text:
Mixed fortunes for Commerzbank & Credit Agricole 9:57am EDT - 01:47
Commerzbank has reported a smaller-than-expected fall in first-quarter pretax profit and has promised to resume dividend payments this year, sending shares in Germany's No. 2 lender up almost 4 percent. As Sonia Legg reports, it wasn't such postive news for French bank Credit Agricole's which saw quarterly profit fall short of expectations.
